avdta.demand

Class DemandImportFromVISTA

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.demand.DemandImportFromVISTA

  • public class DemandImportFromVISTA
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines methods to convert demand data from the VISTA data format to the AVDTA data format. This class uses the following tables from VISTA: static_od, dynamic_od, demand_profile, and demand. To use it, copy the required tables into files, and construct a new DemandImportFromVISTA with the files. The constructor will call all conversion methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DemandImportFromVISTA(DemandProject project, java.io.File static_od, java.io.File dynamic_od, java.io.File demand_profile, java.io.File demand)
      Converts VISTA network data into the AVDTA data format from the following files.
      DemandImportFromVISTA(DemandProject project, java.lang.String directory)
      Calls DemandImportFromVISTA(avdta.project.DemandProject, java.io.File, java.io.File, java.io.File, java.io.File) with a static_od.txt file, a dynamic_od.txt file, a demand_profile.txt file, and a demand.txt file from the specified directory.
